data.trans: Thuốc diệt côn trùng, thuốc trừ sâu
data.trans_hint: Ngày nay hoa quả chứa rất nhiều thuốc trừ sâu.
data.en_hint: Fruits contain lots of pesticides nowadays.
data.content_game_1: Fruits contain lots of pesticides nowadays.
data.answer_en_hint: Fruits contain lots of pesticides nowadays.

data.trans_hint: Quản lí hàng tồn kho là rất quan trọng trong quá trình phân phối.
data.en_hint: Inventory management is very crucial in the process of distribution.
data.content_game_1: Inventory management is very crucial in the process of distribution.
data.answer_en_hint: Inventory management is very crucial in the process of distribution.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đã bị nhiễm khuẩn.
data.content_game_1: She has a bacterial infection.
data.answer_en_hint: She has a bacterial infection.

data.trans: Không dùng chất nhân tạo, hữu cơ
data.trans_hint: Nhà hàng này chỉ dùng nguyên liệu hữu cơ.
data.en_hint: This restaurant only uses organic ingredients.
data.content_game_1: This restaurant only uses organic ingredients.
data.answer_en_hint: This restaurant only uses organic ingredients.

data.trans: (y học) Truyền nhiễm, dễ lây (qua tiếp xúc)
data.trans_hint: Căn bệnh mới rất dễ lây lan.
data.en_hint: The new disease is highly contagious.
data.content_game_1: The new disease is highly contagious.
data.answer_en_hint: The new disease is highly contagious.

data.trans: Liều lượng thuốc dùng trong một lần
data.trans_hint: Em gái tôi luôn uống một liều vitamin C hàng ngày.
data.en_hint: My sister always take her daily dose of vitamin C.
data.content_game_1: My sister always take her daily dose of vitamin C.
data.answer_en_hint: My sister always take her daily dose of vitamin C.

data.trans_hint: Ngay cả trong các công ty nhỏ, máy tính cũng là một công cụ thiết yếu.
data.en_hint: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
data.content_game_1: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
data.answer_en_hint: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.

data.trans_hint: Công nghiệp lọc hóa dầu có nhiều thành tựu nổi bật.
data.en_hint: The petrochemical industry has many outstanding achievements.
data.content_game_1: The petrochemical industry has many outstanding achievements.
data.answer_en_hint: The petrochemical industry has many outstanding achievements.

data.trans_hint: Thuốc này có một số tác dụng phụ.
data.en_hint: The drug has some side effects.
data.content_game_1: The drug has some side effects.
data.answer_en_hint: The drug has some side effects.

data.trans: Bao con nhộng (dạng thuốc), bao vỏ, quả nang (thực vật)
data.trans_hint: Bác sĩ chỉ dẫn tôi uống viên thuốc dạng bao con nhộng vào sáng nay.
data.en_hint: The doctor advised me to take a capsule this morning.
data.content_game_1: The doctor advised me to take a capsule this morning.
data.answer_en_hint: The doctor advised me to take a capsule this morning.

data.en_hint: Soybeans are very rich in protein.
data.content_game_1: Soybeans are very rich in protein.
data.answer_en_hint: Soybeans are very rich in protein.
